TranslatedText: If NGEU goes well, it is possible that many of the measures adopted in extremis to address the pandemic may end up being permanent and others today unthinkable will gain momentum. Within the first group would be the mutualisation of the debt. Perhaps because the German Constitutional has already understood this joint issue because of the urgency of the pandemic, it has made it clear that in the final judgment it will put limits to prevent this capacity to indebted in the EU from being permanent.
